title: karumbu tottathile
sahitya:
karumbu tOTTattilE A karumbu tOTTattilE

caraNam 1

 karumbu tOTTattilE avar kAlgaLum kaigaLum shOrndu vizhumpaDi
varunduginranarE hindu mAdar tan nenju kodittuk-kodittup-pOi
shurunguginranarE avar tunbattai nIkka vazhiyillaiyO oru
marundidarkkillaiyO shekku mADugaL pOluzhaittEnguginrAr andak-

   
caraNam 2

 peNNenru sholliDilO oru pEyum irangumenbAr deivamE nina-
deNNam irangAdO anda Ezhalgal angu shoriyum kaNNIr verum
maNNil kalandiDumO terkku mA-kaDalukku naDunnilE angOr
kaNNaTra tIvinilE tanik-kATTinil peNGaL puzhunguginrAr andak-

   
caraNam 3

 nATTai ninaippArO enda nAninip-pOi adai kANbadenrEyannai
vITTai ninaippArO avar vimmi vimmi vimmi vimmi azhum kural
kETTiruppAi kATrE tunbak-kENiyilE engaL peNgaL azhuda shol
mITTumuraiyAyO avar vimmi azhuvum tiram keTTup-pOyinar

   
caraNam 4

 nenjam kumurugirAr karppu nIngiDar sheyyum koDumaiyilE andap-
panjai maghaLirellAm tunbappaTTu maDinu maDindu maDindoru
 tanjamumillAdE avar shAgum vazhakkattai inda kaNattinil
minja viDalAmO hE vIra karALi cAmuNDi kALi
